verbs.description: [V: slow] [ARG1: cooker] cran - apple chutney my clan is n’t crazy for cranberries but they ca n’t get enough of this delicious chutney i recommend it for thanksgiving as it tastes amazing paired with turkey but it also good on its own —raquel haggard edmond oklahoma
